permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

costs.label: Costs
costs.tooltip: Set the costs for this command.

rewardTwoSame.label: Reward for small Win
rewardTwoSame.tooltip: Reward for the Win - Two same Emotes next to each other

rewardJackpot.label: Reward for Jackpot
rewardJackpot.tooltip: Reward for the Win - Jackpot (3 same)

rewardSuperJackpot.label: Reward for Superjackpot Emote
rewardSuperJackpot.tooltip: Reward for the Win - 3 SuperJackpot Emotes

emoteList.value: Kappa, LUL, NotLikeThis, InuyoFace, WutFace, EleGiggle, MingLee, FeelsBadMan
emoteList.label: List of Emotes
emoteList.tooltip: List of the Emotes you want to use. Seperate them per Comma. More Emotes = Less Chance

superEmote.label: Set the Super Jackpot Emote
superEmote.tooltip: Emote that triggers the Super Jackpot when 3 of them.

onCooldown.value: $user, the command is still on cooldown for $cd seconds!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

onUserCooldown.value: $user the command is still on user cooldown for $cd seconds!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

responseLost.label: No Combination - Lost
responseLost.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user loses. 
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes 
 $user = Username 
 $reward = Points he earned or lost. 
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseReroll.value: You at least got your points back?!
responseReroll.label: Combination - Two Emotes (seperated)
responseReroll.tooltip:
Message that will be posted with 2 Emotes but seperated (e.g.: X O X). 
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes 
 $user = Username 
 $reward = Points he earned or lost. 
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseWon.value: Even a small win is a win..
responseWon.label: Combination - Two Emotes
responseWon.tooltip:
Message that will be posted with 2 Emotes together (e.g.: X X O). 
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes 
 $user = Username 
 $reward = Points he earned or lost. 
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseJackpot.label: Combination - Three Emotes
responseJackpot.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when he has 3 same Emotes. 
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes 
 $user = Username 
 $reward = Points he earned or lost. 
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseSuperJackpot.value: SUPER JACKPOT! YOU ARE THE MVP :D
responseSuperJackpot.label: Combination - Three Superjackpot Emotes
responseSuperJackpot.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when he has 3 super Emotes. 
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes 
 $user = Username 
 $reward = Points he earned or lost. 
 $currency = Name of Currency
